name: Positrons
description:
Author: Tima Zhum

Engine: Unity 3D

Release Date: 13.01.15

Description:

Revolve with a positron around a nucleus and avoid collisions with electrons in order to prevent annihilation. Accomplish different missions to unlock 7+ amusing characters. How long can you survive?

How to play:

Tap on the necessary orbit in order to move on it or use the corresponding button.

Gameplay video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V60PO27RWBc

Contacts: Facebook or Twitter
